Music is a great universal language.  One year we helped a man from Sudan come to the US to study.  He had never been outside of the Blue Nile Region.  Everything was amazing and new to him.  From picking up fast food to flipping on a switch to start a fire (in the gas fireplace) everything was a completely new experience.  He spent Christmas with my family and we gave him a personal CD player.  My little brother made him a mixed CD of songs to listen to.  He immediately started listening and exclaimed ‚ÄúUsher‚Äù.
